code: import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import useDiary from"../hooks/useDiary";import Button from"../component/Button";import Header from"../component/Header";import{getFormattedDate}from"../util";import Viewer from"../component/Viewer";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Diary=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const data=useDiary(id);const navigate=useNavigate();const goBack=()=>{navigate(-1);};const goEdit=()=>{navigate(`/edit/${id}`);};if(!data){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"\uC77C\uAE30\uB97C \uBD88\uB7EC\uC624\uB294 \uC911\uC785\uB2C8\uB2E4..."});}else{const{date,emotionId,content}=data;const title=`${getFormattedDate(new Date(Number(date)))} 기록`;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{title:title,leftChild:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:'< 뒤로 가기',onClink:goBack}),rightChild:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:'수정하기',onClink:goEdit})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Viewer,{content:content,emotionId:emotionId})]});}};export default Diary;
